text: Save-On-Foods is a Canadian supermarket chain. There are Save-On-Foods locations throughout Western Canada. The chain traces its origins back to 1915 with the Overwaitea Foods company and is owned by Pattison Food Group. It is a full service grocery store, with most stores also having a pharmacy. The Save- On-Foods banner launched in 1982. Many Overwaitea Foods stores began to turn into Save-On-Foods stores after that time, with the last Overwaitea Foods store converting in 2021. In 2012, Darrell Jones became the president of Save- On-Foods. The chain has stores in British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba, and the Yukon. == References == ==Other website== * Category:1982 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in British Columbia Category:Supermarkets of Canada
title: Save-On-Foods
